Well, at least Miss Hori saw Kise's groping so that could be something of a keypoint that might be useful later in the plot. Patience guys, when it comes (netorare), then it will come in quite a bit of unexpected way, at least that's what I feel Ryoh-zoh is trying to pull off. So for you weak-hearted fellas, I suggest you guys wait until we scout that for ya if you ain't want that heart-wrenching pain xD in the upcoming chapters.
